name: Treehouse Dark Theme
description: Attractive dark theme for Treehouse. Learn to code without burning your retinas.
additional_info:
My other UserStyles: Antisocial (hides Questions and Community), Hide Support, Hide Techdegree.

As I come across bugs (I'm very active on Treehouse), I will update the theme.

Please note that this stylesheet is not an example of how I would write CSS on my own projects! :)
